headline: Blair Effron Discusses Paramount, Warner Acquisition
summary: Centerview Partners co-founder Blair Effron said he is confident Paramount has a better bid on the table compared to Netflix.

raw.headline: Blair Effron Discusses Paramount, Warner Acquisition
raw.summary: Centerview Partners co-founder Blair Effron said he is confident Paramount has a better bid on the table compared to Netflix.

headline: Paramount Adviser Says of Warner Hostile Bid: ‘We’re Gonna Win’
summary: Blair Effron, co-founder of investment bank Centerview Partners, said at WSJ Invest Live that Paramount will be successful in its hostile pursuit of Warner Bros. Discovery, despite Warner’s existing deal with Netflix.  “We’re gonna win,” Effron, who has been advising Paramount, said.  Paramount launched a $77.9 billion tender offer for Warner shortly after Warner unveiled its $72 billion Netflix deal.

headline: The Biggest Obstacle to Netflix Acquiring Warner Bros. Isn't Paramount Skydance. It's This.
summary: Regulators are already concerned that a Netflix-Warner Bros. deal could raise significant antitrust issues.
